inputs.name: maxWidth
inputs.text: Defines a maximum width for each breadcrumb item. Overflowing text is hidden and an ellipsis is displayed.

inputs.name: separator
inputs.text: Defines a separator, which is inserted between / separated parts of a route in the label. Example: the route user/:id will be displayed with the label User - U1234. The separator is ignored for routes with a breadcrumb label.

inputs.name: beautifyUrl
inputs.text: If there's no breadcrumb label defined for a route, the url will be used as label. If this option is set to true, the url will be beautified by splitting on -, uppercasing the first letter and joining with ' ' (custom-page becomes Custom Page).

variables.name: maxWidth
variables.text: Defines a maximum width for each breadcrumb item. Overflowing text is hidden and an ellipsis is displayed.

variables.name: separator
variables.text: Defines a separator, which is inserted between '/' separated parts of a route in the label. Example: the route 'user/:id' will be displayed with the label 'User - U1234'. The separator is ignored for routes with a breadcrumb label.

variables.name: beautifyUrl
variables.text: If there's no breadcrumb label defined for a route, the url will be used as label. If this option is set to true, the url will be beautified by splitting on '-', uppercasing the first letter and joining with ' ' ('custom-page' becomes 'Custom Page').
